techmeme.title: OpenAI expands its Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program to let developers create expert models in specific domains with very little training data (OpenAI)
Meta announces Llama 3.3 70B, a text-only model that Meta claims can deliver the performance of its largest Llama model at a lower cost (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
xAI makes its AI chatbot Grok available to all users of X; non-Premium subscribers can send up to 10 messages to Grok every two hours (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Sources: trading and investment platform eToro weighs a US IPO as soon as Q2, 2025, seeking a $3.5B+ valuation; it has 38M+ registered users from 75 countries (Bloomberg)
Coinbase publishes FDIC documents, obtained via a lawsuit, that it says prove crypto businesses were systematically walled off from banking by the regulator (Jesse Hamilton/CoinDesk)
